com.bluegosling.vars

Class VariableShort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • com.bluegosling.vars.VariableShort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class VariableShort
extends Number
implements Cloneable
    A simple variable reference for a short. This is the primitive specialization of Variable for short.

    This class is not thread-safe. This class is very similar to the boxed type Short except that it is mutable.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public short updateAndGet(ShortUnaryOperator fn)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • accumulateAndGet

        public short accumulateAndGet(short v,
                              ShortBinaryOperator fn)
        Accumulates the given value into the variable using the given function. After this method returns, the variable's value is the result of applying the function to the variable's previous value and the specified value.
        Parameters:
        v - the value to accumulate into the variable
        fn - the function to apply
        Returns:
        the variable's new value
